description.description: Description of the files structure on Azure.

location.description: Location of the files on Azure. */* patterns are supported. {model} can be used and will be replaced by the models listed in the data contract.

file_format.description: Format of the files hosted on Azure. csv, json or parquet are supported.

ref_encryption_key.description: Name of the symetric encryption key (or http reference in the Key store - not yet supported) used to by the data provider to encrypte data.

encryption_key.description: AES 256 symetric encryption key used to encrypt files at rest - works only for parquet files.

connection_key.description: Connection key id to access the files on Azure.

share_access_token.description: Share access token (alternative solution to connection key) to access the files on Azure
